channel.title: Softlayer_container_product_order_newcustomersetup on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_product_order_newcustomersetup on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_NewCustomerSetup
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_NewCustomerSetup Datatype Description This is the datatype that needs to be populated and sent to SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder when linking a Bluemix account to a newly created SoftLayer account. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Product_Order::verifyOrder SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder Local authorizationToken Type: string bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean billingInformation Billing Information associated with an order. For existing customers this information is completely ignored.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_NewCustomerSetup
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_NewCustomerSetup Datatype Description This is the datatype that needs to be populated and sent to SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder when linking a Bluemix account to a newly created SoftLayer account. Local authorizationToken Type: string bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean billingInformation Billing Information associated with an order. For existing customers this information is completely ignored. Do not send this information for existing customers.
